```{r, echo=FALSE, include= TRUE}

library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Supondo que sua tabela esteja em um data.frame chamado df
df <- data.frame(
  Caracteristica = c("faixa_etaria", "  Adolescente", "  Jovem Adulto", "  Adulto", "  Idoso",
                     "genero", "  Homem", "  Mulher",
                     "fumante", "  Não", "  Sim",
                     "historico_fumante", "  Não", "  Sim",
                     "historico_radioterapia", "  Não", "  Sim",
                     "quadro_tireoide", "  Eutireoide", "  Hipertireoidismo Clínico",
                     "  Hipertireoidismo Subclínico", "  Hipotireoidismo Clínico",
                     "  Hipotireoidismo Subclínico"),
  Baixo = c("", "3 (1.2%)", "115 (46%)", "108 (43%)", "23 (9.2%)",
            "", "27 (11%)", "222 (89%)",
            "", "234 (94%)", "15 (6.0%)",
            "", "235 (94%)", "14 (5.6%)",
            "", "248 (100%)", "1 (0.4%)",
            "", "216 (87%)", "14 (5.6%)", "5 (2.0%)", "9 (3.6%)", "5 (2.0%)"),
  Alto = c("", "4 (3.0%)", "42 (31%)", "53 (40%)", "35 (26%)",
           "", "44 (33%)", "90 (67%)",
           "", "100 (75%)", "34 (25%)",
           "", "120 (90%)", "14 (10%)",
           "", "128 (96%)", "6 (4.5%)",
           "", "116 (87%)", "6 (4.5%)", "0 (0%)", "3 (2.2%)", "9 (6.7%)"),
  p_value = c("<0.001", "", "", "", "",
              "<0.001", "", "",
              "<0.001", "", "",
              "<0.13", "", "",
              "<0.008", "", "",
              "<0.079", "", "", "", "", "")
)


# Dividindo os dados
df1 <- df[1:11, ]   # até fumante
df2 <- df[12:nrow(df), ]  # histórico e quadro_tireoide

# Criando as tabelas
tab1 <- kable(df1, "html", align = c("l","r","r","r")) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F, font_size = 13) %>%
  row_spec(0:nrow(df1), extra_css = "font-size:15px;")

tab2 <- kable(df2, "html", align = c("l","r","r","r")) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F, font_size = 13) %>%
  row_spec(0:nrow(df2), extra_css = "font-size:15px;")

# Exibindo lado a lado
htmltools::browsable(
  htmltools::tags$div(
    style = "display:flex; gap:20px;",  # espaço entre as tabelas
    htmltools::HTML(tab1),
    htmltools::HTML(tab2)
  )
)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, include= TRUE}
# Tabela 1: Níveis de Medidas de Associação
medidas <- data.frame(
  Medida = c("Coeficiente Phi", "Coeficiente de Contingência", "V de Cramer"),
  Niveis = c(
    "0 : <span style='color:yellow'>Nenhuma</span><br>
     0.1 - 0.3 : <span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span><br>
     0.3 - 0.5 : <span style='color:green'>Moderada</span><br>
     > 0.5 : <span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    
    "0 : Nenhuma<br>
     0.1 - 0.2 : <span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span><br>
     0.2 - 0.4 : <span style='color:green'>Moderada</span><br>
     > 0.4 : <span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    
    "0 : Nenhuma<br>
     0.1 - 0.2 : <span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span><br>
     0.2 - 0.4 : <span style='color:green'>Moderada</span><br>
     > 0.4 : <span style='color:red'>Forte</span>"
  )
)

kable(medidas, "html", escape = FALSE, align = c("l","l")) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F) %>%
  row_spec(0:nrow(medidas), extra_css = "font-size:13px;")

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, include= TRUE}

# Tabela 2: Medidas de Associação com o Risco
associacao <- data.frame(
  Variavel = c("faixa_etaria","gênero","fumante","histórico_radioterapia"),
  Coef_Phi = c("Não aplicável","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>",
               "<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>"),
  Coef_Contingencia = c("<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>",
                        "<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>"),
  V_Cramer = c("<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>",
               "<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>")
)

kable(associacao, "html", escape = FALSE, align = c("l","c","c","c")) %>%
    kable_styling(full_width = F) %>%
  row_spec(0:nrow(associacao), extra_css = "font-size:15px;")

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, include= TRUE}
# Criando o data.frame
reocorrencia <- data.frame(
  Variavel = c(
    "faixa_etaria","genero","fumante","historico_fumante",
    "historico_radioterapia","quadro_tireoide","exame_fisico",
    "adenopatia","estagio","patologia","foco","risco",
    "resposta_tratamento","T","N","M"
  ),
  Coef_Phi = c(
    "Não aplicável","<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    "<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>",
    "<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>","Não aplicável","Não aplicável",
    "Não aplicável","Não aplicável","Não aplicável",
    "<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>","<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    "Não aplicável","Não aplicável","<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    "<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>"
  ),
  Coef_Contingencia = c(
    "<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>","<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>",
    "<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>",
    "<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>","<span style='color:yellow'>Nenhuma</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>",
    "<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>","<span style='color:yellow'>Nenhuma</span>","<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>",
    "<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>","<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    "<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>","<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>","<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>",
    "<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>"
  ),
  V_Cramer = c(
    "<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>","<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    "<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>",
    "<span style='color:yellow'>Fraca</span>","<span style='color:yellow'>Nenhuma</span>","<span style='color:blue'>Fraca</span>",
    "<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>","<span style='color:yellow'>Nenhuma</span>","<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>",
    "<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>","<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    "<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>","<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>","<span style='color:red'>Forte</span>",
    "<span style='color:green'>Moderada</span>"
  )
)

# Criando a tabela HTML com kableExtra
kable(reocorrencia, "html", escape = FALSE, align = c("l","c","c","c"), caption = "") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F) %>%
  row_spec(0:nrow(reocorrencia), extra_css = "font-size:13px;")


```
